name: Armed Warrior VR
description: Realistic VR Action Game that deals with various weapons in battle and becomes a true medieval warrior! It has a virtual fantasy world view that matches the emotions of the global market. The hero use weapons such as swords, shields, bows and guns, defeating the enemies and becoming a true warrior.
minimum_requirements: OS: window7 Processor:  Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics:  DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1 GB available space
